ALLTriggers.Description: Not sure if this is an example, it was in this template, is it not part of the trigger words selected by Panama Team.

Iniciar el chat del programa.

This is the initial word that caregivers must send to activate the course and register.

Writing the word HELP provides contact informa
tion for preventing and addressing issues related to domestic violence, sexual violence, mental health, addictions, and other urgent situations (safeguarding)   

With this word, the data from the referral directory will appear.
Typing the word “MENU” will allow caregivers to change settings, review sessions they have completed, and replay the Welcome video.

Writing the word HELP provides contact information for preventing and addressing issues related to domestic violence, sexual violence, mental health, addictions, and other urgent situations (safeguarding)

Typing this triggers the Development Assessment Tool. This is offered as a home activity for the child development module. 

In the opening sessions we would work them through the features for ParentText and explain the tool.
Not for all deployments but users can receive a message directing them to digital books resources that they can use for reading with their children.
Specifically for sexual violence prevention module in teens. When typing this, parents can review this module with their teen since it’s their home activity.
Triggers the pause video (which is sent during onboarding)

This is the initial word you need to send to activate the course.
As the facilitator, you must start the chat with this command so we can differentiate you from the caregivers.

This command should NOT be shared with caregivers.

This command will be useful to the caregiver when taking a session and the automatic chat does not send the following message automatically.

This command does not work to start a new session. Once the session is over we recommend that caregivers wait a day for the WhatsApp Course to automatically grant them access to a new session.

Iniciar el chat del programa.

This is the initial word that caregivers must send to activate the course and register.

This is the initial word you need to send to activate the course.
As the facilitator, you must start the chat with this command so we can differentiate you from the caregivers.

This command should NOT be shared with caregivers.
Users who join because someone shared a link with them from the menu
